title: Native image build NPE

labels.name: triage/upstream
labels.description: Used for issues which are caused by issues in upstream projects/dependency

body:
### Describe the bug

@jerboaa I'll refer to ticket [#27382](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/27382)
The local native build on my MacBook with Docker environment works. 
The build in Jenkins with a Kubernetes pod for the native build and no Docker environment then has the NPE at runtime. So I use JIB for the container build.

Your workaround worked.

### Expected behavior

_No response_

_No response_
